meanings.definition: Coming after the fourteenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the fifteenth day of the month.
meanings.sent2: The fifteenth cupcake was decorated with sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: The fifteenth cookie in the jar always magically disappears first.
meanings.sent4: The fifteenth puzzle piece was the key to solving the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The fifteenth star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.sent1: She ate a fifteenth of the pizza all by herself.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into a fifteenth for each guest.
meanings.sent3: The fifteenth of the pie mysteriously vanished from the plate.
meanings.sent4: His voice was just a fifteenth of the choir's harmonious sound.
meanings.sent5: The fifteenth of the treasure map led to a hidden cave.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to fifteen.
meanings.sent1: On the calendar, her birthday was marked as the fifteenth.
meanings.sent2: The fifteenth in line was the last to receive a prize.
meanings.sent3: The fifteenth balloon at the party popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent4: In the race, he finished in the fifteenth position.
meanings.sent5: The fifteenth page of the book held the most exciting twist.
